issue.title: [C++] Small Warning/Linkage cleanups
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5789](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5789). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Cleanup some unused warning generated on MacOS, when asserts are turned off
- Change linkage of ubsan.h nullptr replacement from from internal to external (actually build ubsan.cc).  An alternative would be to delete ubsan.cc

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5789?focusedCommentId=16878421) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4750
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4750>
